package.shortdescription: acdk_text contains classes for text rendering and parsing, including perl like regular expressions.

package.description:
acdk_text corresponds to the java.text packages.
See also %nsref[acdk::text].
Additionally acdk_text contains %cref[acdk::text::RegExp] for Perl like regular expression.
